alert.note: Alert for Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 26 at 10:43AM EST until February 27 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County. For the Iroquois River...including Rensselaer, Foresman, Iroquois, Chebanse...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected around 12 AM CST late tonight. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and/or snowmelt and/or ice jam continues. * WHERE...Iroquois River near Foresman. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flooding begins to low lying agricultural areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below Action Stage this evening. - Action stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
